channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- Rockwell Automation RSLinx Classic and FactoryTalk Linx Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- Rockwell Automation RSLinx Classic and FactoryTalk Linx Gateway

item.title: CVE-2018-10619|2024-08-05T07:46:46.252Z -- ics-cert -- rockwell%20automation%20rslinx%20classic%20and%20factorytalk%20linx%20gateway
item.description: An unquoted search path or element in RSLinx Classic Versions 3.90.01 and prior and FactoryTalk Linx Gateway Versions 3.90.00 and prior may allow an authorized, but non-privileged local user to execute arbitrary code and allow a threat actor to escalate user privileges on the affected workstation.
